name: You are Always Exploding
description:
Made for the 111th Mini Jam - Colours

A small platformer where every few second you explode into colour, dealing damage to everything near you (including yourself) and painting everything around with wild colours!

WASD to move, Space to jump, LMB to shoot.

Hold R to restart, hold ESC to quit to menu.

W & S to traverse menu, click to select.
